quote: Welcome to Vesuvio, where family, food, and loyalty, intertwine to create an unforgettable dining experience
workingHours:
Working Hours

spaghettiBolognese.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
spaghettiBolognese.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with rich meat sauce

margheritaPizza.name: Margherita Pizza
margheritaPizza.description: Traditional thin-crust pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil

chickenParmesan.name: Chicken Parmesan
chickenParmesan.description: Breaded chicken cutlet topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese, served with pasta

grilledSalmon.name: Grilled Salmon
grilledSalmon.description: Tender grilled salmon fillet served with a lemon butter sauce and seasonal vegetables

eggplantParmigiana.name: Eggplant Parmigiana
eggplantParmigiana.description: Layers of breaded and fried eggplant with marinara sauce, cheese, and herbs

aperolSpritz.name: Aperol Spritz
aperolSpritz.description: Refreshing cocktail made with Aperol, Prosecco, and a splash of soda water

espressoMartini.name: Espresso Martini
espressoMartini.description: Vodka-based cocktail infused with coffee liqueur and a shot of espresso

negroni.name: Negroni
negroni.description: Classic cocktail featuring equal parts of gin, sweet vermouth, and Campari

garlicBread.name: Garlic Bread
garlicBread.description: Toasted bread topped with garlic-infused butter and sprinkled with herbs

capreseSalad.name: Caprese Salad
capreseSalad.description: Fresh salad made with ripe tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and a drizzle of balsamic glaze
